unnormalised: Interesting to see Ishan Kishore move from Mohun Bagan. Rs. 2.5 Crore is a big price tag! Reminds me of the DDLJ climax, will he finally reach his "Simran" – the I-League trophy, with East Bengal? Transfers like Sandesh Jhingan to Kerala Blasters are vital for league visibility. Hoping for more transparency from AIFF regarding these deals. The 1500 km distance between Kolkata and Kochi will surely be a test. Good luck to all!
normalised: Interesting to see Ishan Kishore move from Mohun Bagan. Rupees two point five crore is a big price tag! Reminds me of the D D L J climax, will he finally reach his "Simran" – the I-League trophy, with East Bengal? Transfers like Sandesh Jhingan to Kerala Blasters are vital for league visibility. Hoping for more transparency from A I F F regarding these deals. The one thousand five hundred kilometer distance between Kolkata and Kochi will surely be a test. Good luck to all!
